title: Ashram Coatepec
description: A health retreat kind of place. Location is known as the Ashram - it is situated on 30 acres of forest ground with open trails. Guest can pay for an overnight stay. Serves vegetarian food. From Coatepec it's a short taxi ride.
streetAddress: Javier Mina 100 , Colonia los Carriles, Coatepec
